reviewText: I'm a Grady fan, but there's just not enough on this video to justify the price.  It's a collection of tidbits, a random collection of shots, with nothing to hold it together.  Maybe it would be pure gold to an experienced one hole player who needed just the shot Grady was teaching.  I was looking for something more basic, more strategic.  So if you already know the game well, there might be something here for you that would pay for the DVD.  If you're new to the game, you won't get much help.
